plot: Washington DC . A luxury home parties bring Reuben and Dimas , Indonesian students studying in America . That night both promised ; one day they will write a book , a novel science that moves the hearts of many people . The story of the Knight , Princess and The Shooting Star .  Jakarta . Of an executive office , an impromptu interview between executive Ferre - young, rich , smart , and well-known - and Rana - deputy chief editor of the top women - changing way of life both. Both fall in love . In fact , Rana has been married to Arwin , entrepreneurs of well-known and respected family .  Diva , a top model suddenly appeared in the life Ferre . It turns out that during this Diva stay in the same cluster with Ferre , even their houses facing each other .  Reuben and Dimas , Ferre , Rana , Arwin and Diva , finally met without mutually recognize each other in a blog aggressive , poetic , romantic , phenomenal named Supernova . Their story exploded along Supernova .
title: Supernova-The Knight, the Princess and the Shooting Star
